en.title: [2024] Sarawak Yearbook
en.description: Annual compilation of key data for Sarawak, including its population, economy, education, and health.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest annual Sarawak Yearbook, presenting a compilation of key statistics for Sarawak, including its population, economy, education, and health.

bm.title: [2024] Buku Tahunan Sarawak
bm.description: Kompilasi tahunan data penting bagi Sarawak, termasuk penduduk, ekonomi, pendidikan, dan kesihatan.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan Buku Tahunan Sarawak terkini, iaitu kompilasi data penting untuk Sarawak, termasuk penduduk, ekonomi, pendidikan, dan kesihatan.
